name: cfloginuser
description:
Identifies an authenticated user to CFML. Specifies the
 user ID and roles. Used within a cflogin tag.

params.name: roles
params.description:
A comma-delimited list of role identifiers.

 CFML processes spaces in a list element as part of
 the element.
